name: Bastion of Ceres
description:
Bastion of Ceres is a fast-paced top-down shooter following the story of a gardener turned ranger fighting his way through pests to save gardeners and harvesters. Pick your weapon of choice and fight your hardest to eradicate these vicious animals to save the country!

Core Features : 
1. Big Variety of weapons
Weapons at each level are different. Starting from a gun to a grenade launcher. Play now and try a wide variety of weapons.

2. Ability
The Player has 3 abilities and one of them will change each level. Ability will help you to kill those pests!

3. Challenging Enemies
More than 5+ various pests. Melee, slow movement to those that shoot radioactive energy.

4. Smooth & Immersive Gameplay
Every element in the game has been carefully thought out by us so that it provides a very immersive playing experience and a very smooth and agile movement mechanic.
